name: P384.KeyAgreement
desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing NIST P-384 elliptic curve Diffie Hellman (ECDH) key exchange.

items.name: struct P384.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
items.desc: A P-384 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: struct P384.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
items.desc: A P-384 public key used for key agreement.
